class_notes: Synchronous class meeting (first class only) on August 23, Wed 7p-7:30pm.
course_description: The course prepares advanced practice nurses to determine their financial viability within organizations, to engage in strategic business decision making, to consider functioning as an entrepreneur and to financially partner successfully as clinician in a paradigm of care delivery.
